description: Describes the specified local gateway virtual interfaces.

parameters.name: LocalGatewayVirtualInterfaceIds
parameters.description: The IDs of the virtual interfaces. (string) ---

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: One or more filters. local-address - The local address. local-bgp-asn - The Border Gateway Protocol (BGP) Autonomous System Number (ASN) of the local gateway. local-gateway-id - The ID of the local gateway. local-gateway-virtual-interface-id - The ID of the virtual interface. owner-id - The ID of the Amazon Web Services account that owns the local gateway virtual interface. peer-address - The peer address. peer-bgp-asn - The peer BGP ASN. vlan - The ID of the VLAN. (dict) --- A filter name and value pair that is used to return a more specific list of results from a describe operation. Filters can be used to match a set of resources by specific criteria, such as tags, attributes, or IDs. If you specify multiple filters, the filters are joined with an AND, and the request returns only results that match all of the specified filters. For more information, see List and filter using the CLI and API in the Amazon EC2 User Guide. Name (string) --- The name of the filter. Filter names are case-sensitive. Values (list) --- The filter values. Filter values are case-sensitive. If you specify multiple values for a filter, the values are joined with an OR, and the request returns all results that match any of the specified values. (string) ---

nested_items.name: LocalGatewayVirtualInterfaceId
nested_items.description: The ID of the virtual interface.

nested_items.name: LocalGatewayId
nested_items.description: The ID of the local gateway.

nested_items.name: LocalGatewayVirtualInterfaceGroupId
nested_items.description: The ID of the local gateway virtual interface group.

nested_items.name: LocalGatewayVirtualInterfaceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Number (ARN) of the local gateway virtual interface.

nested_items.name: LocalBgpAsn
nested_items.description: The Border Gateway Protocol (BGP) Autonomous System Number (ASN) of the local gateway.

nested_items.name: PeerBgpAsnExtended
nested_items.description: The extended 32-bit ASN of the BGP peer for use with larger ASN values.

nested_items.name: OwnerId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account that owns the local gateway virtual interface.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: The tags assigned to the virtual interface.

nested_items.name: ConfigurationState
nested_items.description: The current state of the local gateway virtual interface.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token to use to retrieve the next page of results. This value is null when there are no more results to return.
